channel.title: How do you get it to show things on the screen?
channel.description:
Hey, :D
How do you get it so it shows things like the time, how many players are online and things like that on top of the screen?
thanks if you can help -fatcat-

item.title: How do you get it to show things on the screen?
item.dc:creator: @sic_pure sic pure
item.description:
@sic_pure wrote:

Iâ€™ll try and find something out of my client.java, 1 minute.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 17, 2007, 05:53:02 AM[/size][hr]Ok, make a backup of client.java in case you mess up.

Go into client.java, search for

outStream.writeByteS((tileObjectType<<2) +(orientation&3)); }

then right below that bracket add this

//Playercount and server name at top of screen public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@yel@Slip's SlaughterHouse", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Owner: @yel@Slipknot", 6572); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }

now just mess around with it and see what you get
hope this helps
